boardgame.name: Key to the City: London
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Key to the City _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; London, each player aims to develop their own London borough based on their home tile, using the large hexagonal location tiles. Each location tile gives victory points and may generate resources (skill tiles or connectors that connect two location tiles). Connectors and skill tiles can be used to upgrade location tiles for additional victory points and productivity._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is played over four eras, and in each era, new location tiles will be available for bidding. In both era 1 and 2, these tiles consist of six resource-generating tiles, plus some additional building tiles. In era 3, there will be only building tiles, which arrive already upgraded. In era 4, some of the Routemaster tiles become available._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On their turn, a player chooses one of five actions. They may use one or more of their team of wooden workers (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;keyples_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) to (1) bid for a location tile, (2) use a location tile to generate resources, or (3) upgrade a location. They may (4) pass, in which case they may play again in that era, or (5) cease playing in that era by setting off in their sailing barge along the Thames. The game finishes after the last river barge sets sail at the end of era 4, at which point the player with the most victory points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Key to the City _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; London has similarities in structure to the award-winning 2012 R_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D game Keyflower._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2017 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Multi-player Nominee

listing.notes: If you are a EU citizen who has access to free wire transfer, but wanna pay with PayPal instead, the fee is at your charge.

Game: Key to the City - London (Quined Master Print) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: multilingual in stock (just arrived from Essen fair!) Thanks in advance for ordering! See below for information on shipping, payment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; cancellation. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 frank@spieleberatung.com

Condition: Complete game (no missing pieces). All components in good condition. Rules most likely will have handwritten clarifications on them. Game price and Shipping cost depends on the 3 regions. If you are in Canada, game price is in Canadian $ and shipping is 20 CDN$. If you are in the USA, game price is in US $ and shipping is 30 US$. If you are in EU, game price is in Euros and shipping is 80 Euros. Shipping is the same for multiple items. Payment: PayPal only. My Paypal username is : pnomikos@cogeco.ca If you are in Canada, you pay in CDN$ (game price and shipping). If you are in the USA, you pay in US$ (game price and shipping). If you are in EU, you pay in Euros (game price and shipping). Example: The price of the game is 10$. If you are in Canada, your total cost is 10+20=30 CDN$. If you are in the USA, your total cost is 10+30=40 US$. If you are in EU, your total cost is 10+80=90 Euros.
Shipping £3 within the UK, at cost elsewhere.
Punched and bagged. Unplayed Venmo or PayPal (no-fee). Cash if local in NYC.
